channel.title: Problem with airmon-ng
channel.description:
Hello guys ^_^ so recently i tried something with airmon-ng but whenever i run it i got "Cannot access /sys/class/ieee80211/' " : No such file or directory
Things i tried
* apt-get update && apt-get upgrade && apt-get dist-upgrade -y
* apt-get install linux-headers-`uname -r`
* apt-get install synaptic -y
* Reboot
The result from iwconfig is
* lo no wireless extensions.
* eth0 no wireless extensions.
Any advices ? :)

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: IoTh1nkN0t
item.description:
VM, also known as Virtual Machine, doesn’t have access to your NIC directly.
You will need an external WLAN adapter and support for USB in the VM.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: spylegion
item.description:
Seems i have to get external adapter, because kali does not support my current one, and yes Phoenix i’m using VM Anyway thanks a lot for everyone who respond to this thread <3

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: Cal0X
item.description:
Are you using an external adapter or internal one? Most of the time internal adapter (the one which comes along built-in) don’t support airmon.

Cal0X

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: anon79434934
item.description:
Spoderman pls.

Well he is right too, but be sure to check if your wifi chip is compatible too @spylegion.

-Phoenix750

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: _py
item.description:
Are you sure the drivers are installed correctly?

I did a 2ms google research and I found this thread http://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/306836/airmon-ng-ls-cannot-access-sys-class-ieee80211-no-such-file-or-directory. It might help.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: anon79434934
item.description:
Well look who’s back!

First things first: are you running from outside a VM and is your wifi chipset supported by aircrack?

-Phoenix750

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with airmon-ng
item.dc:creator: spylegion
item.description:
Hello guys so recently i tried something with airmon-ng but whenever i run it i got "Cannot access /sys/class/ieee80211/’ " : No such file or directory

Things i tried

  • apt-get update && apt-get upgrade && apt-get dist-upgrade -y

  • apt-get install linux-headers-uname -r

  • apt-get install synaptic -y

  • Reboot

The result from iwconfig is

  • lo no wireless extensions.

  • eth0 no wireless extensions.

Any advices ?

Read full topic
